article: I am a boy. My name is Jim Green. Jim is my _ name and Green is my last name. My birthday is _ June 7th. I have a birthday party every year. My favorite _ is math at school. My favorite _ is ping-pong. I think it's easy _ me and it's relaxing. I often play it with my classmates after class. Do you like sports? When is your birthday? Can you tell _ ?
